# Pricing | GSAP

# Pricing: Now Free!

![](data:image/png;base64,)
![](data:image/png;base64,)
![](/tf-assets/blue-circle-f625c7df.png)
drag me

### 

You heard us right. GSAP is now 100% free for all users, thanks to Webflow’s support.

It's time.

## Animation Superpowers for everyone!

GSAP has been at the forefront of web animation for over 15 years, evolving from the days of ActionScript into the industry-leading animation toolset it is today. Our goal has always been simple: to provide everyone with animation superpowers. And now thanks to Webflow’s generous support, we’re able to offer the entire GSAP library for free.

Supported by Webflow.

## Maintained by GSAP

The GSAP library is maintained by the original GSAP team - working full time at Webflow. With over 15 years in the trenches, we understand the challenges developers face. Our tools are created to be flexible, efficient, and a joy to use.
Together with Webflow, we’re committed to shaping the future of web animation, and proud to support the passionate community that brings it to life.

### 

Trusted by

* ![Ryan Mulligan / Creative Dev](/tf-assets/a7U_Z4IFhX-400-e10633c4.jpeg)

  Every time a new GSAP plugin is introduced, I'm close to bursting from excitement. The simplicity of the API makes applying these tools in projects such a dream.

  Ryan Mulligan / Creative Dev
* ![Sara Soueidan / Design engineer](/tf-assets/zLzagxA1p4-400-3760758c.jpeg)

  GSAP is the best thing that happened to SVG animations since SVG animations.

  Sara Soueidan / Design engineer
* ![Ilja van Eck / Osmo](/tf-assets/njD4n1KjKi-400-ce29d0e2.jpeg)

  Discovering GSAP made me fall in love with creative development. I’m continually amazed by how complete, intuitive, and thoughtful GSAP is—it honestly feels unfair how many clever features they’ve packed into it. I couldn’t imagine building without it.

  Ilja van Eck / Osmo
* ![Petr Tichy / Front-end Dev](/tf-assets/mY-qDvj6Za-400-387c6cb7.jpeg)

  There is no doubt that GSAP is currently the best available tool for creating astonishing interactive websites and animation effects.

  Petr Tichy / Front-end Dev
* ![Franco Arza / darkroom engineering](/tf-assets/ovHji_ZVR3-400-cd0b2d0f.jpeg)

  We try all the new tools and libraries as soon as they hit social media, but there's one that has been solid ground for us, GSAP. No matter how much the pendulum swings, we still keep GSAP in our package.json

  Franco Arza / darkroom engineering
* ![Adam Kuhn / Front-End Dev](/tf-assets/ysdsDGBV7j-400-9a6b48a4.jpeg)

  The depth of GSAP blows me away like all the time. It seems like I stumble on something new and amazing every time I peek at the docs.

  Adam Kuhn / Front-End Dev
* ![Eric Van Holtz / OKAY DEV](/tf-assets/1jmxXeAT4F-400-3af503bd.jpeg)

  Even the little things, like matchMedia(), make animation easier and more accessible. Plus, GSAP’s support is next-level. Now, with Webflow’s backing, the future looks brighter than ever!

  Eric Van Holtz / OKAY DEV
